tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp may use device identifiers on users.
tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
quoteText: This includes information such as hardware model, operating system information, browser information, IP address, mobile network information including phone number, and device identifiers.
